es.csic.iiia.nsm.visualization

Class NormSynthesisInspector

  • java.lang.Object
    • es.csic.iiia.nsm.visualization.NormSynthesisInspector

  • public class NormSynthesisInspector
extends java.lang.Object
    This tool manages builds and starts a new thread for each frame that is showing relevant information of the system
    Author:
    Javier Morales (jmorales@iiia.csic.es)
